title: What is the significance of the Ventesimo title and the tabella of meals in the Sinedrio?
first_phrase: The text titled "Ventesimo - INTESTAZIONE MASS" discusses the use of Masonic forms in the Eastern Egyptian jurisdiction and the "Sinedrio". It emphasizes that the Masonic form is only complementary to the external use when it is necessary to express an idea to those who are ignorant of Absolute Science. The abbreviations are purely external and the master initiators shall make the neophytes understand the significance of these words. The text further presents the first and second tables of meal plans from November to April and May to September, respectively. The tables detail the meals for each day of the week.
content: Domenica - Pranzo e cena a piacere -il pranzo sarà' a mezzodi' e la cena alle ore 24 - Lunedi' - Pranzo - Minestra qualunque - pesce a piacere e carne salata o fresca, pane, vino e frutta – Cena - Insalata cotta o cruda, composta qualunque, pane, vino e frutta - Martedì' - Pranzo - Pasta o riso, carne o pesce secco, pane, vino e frutta - Cena - Come sopra - Mercoledì' - Pranzo - Legumi di qualunque specie - uova o fritto a piacere, pane, vino e frutta Cena - idem - Giovedì' - Pranzo - Minestra verde con carne di qualunque specie o fritto a piacere, pane, vino e frutta – Cena - come le altre sera - Venerdì' - Pranzo - Legumi, carne fresca o salata, pane, vino e frutta Cena - simile alle altre – Sabato - Pranzo - Minestra a piacere, carne fresca o salata, pane, vino e frutta – Cena - idem – - Seconda tabella – - Dal 1 maggio a tutto Settembre – - Pranzo un'ora dopo mezzogiorno - cena alle ore 24 - Domenica - Pranzo e Cena a piacere - Lunedi' - Pranzo - Minestra verde, carne, pane, vino e frutta – Cena - Insalata, pane, vino e frutta - Martedì' - Pranzo - Maccheroni con brodo di carne, carne, pane, vino e frutta.
last_phrase: In conclusion, if you need to plan your meals for a week or even months, this table can be a useful guide. With a variety of dishes that include meat, fish, vegetables, and dairy, you can create a balanced and satisfying menu. Remember to adjust the portions according to the number of people you are serving and enjoy your meals!
